alert.note: Alert for Darlington; Dillon; Marlboro (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 3:05PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Dillon, northeastern Darlington and Marlboro Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 305 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Chavistown, or 7 miles northwest of Bennettsville, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bennettsville, Mccoll, Clio, Dovesville, Hamer, Mont Clare, Auburn, Wallace, Bingham, Chavistown, Floyd, Dunbar, Little Rock, Minturn, Society Hill, Blenheim, and Tatum. This includes Interstate 95 in South Carolina near mile marker 197. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
